virtual const MBitmap * bitmap (char c, bool ascii=true) const =0
 

Member Function Documentation

virtual const MBitmap* Draw::MBFont::bitmap ( char  c,
bool  ascii = true 
) const
pure virtual

This methods draws a character (c) on the font's bitmap and returns a pointer to the bitmap.

Parameters
cThe character to draw
asciitrue if c is an ascii character or false the font is an icon font
Returns
A pointer to a bitmap or zero if the character could not be loaded

Implemented in Draw::MBFontMemory.
